text:
Good Evening, I am sorry about a late reply.
Hope your Monday was great. 

It is a great article! It let me to understand more of the process. 

I downloaded Zbrush trial to make UVs on the girl. Would you mind just to show me slightly more of Mari?
Hope that would be alright? 

As well, I would like to speak about the showreel and ask a little of your opinion, if that would be okay. 

Thank you!
